title: KornKolio
author: KornKolio
content: Looking to buy aged Solana wallet (empty) with some transactions made.Old Helium network wallet not in use anymore is a good example. Even compromised one is good enough.I will use it and benefit from an NFT gaming Solana project (in-game rewards).Willing to pay ~100$ for the proper one.Please contact me on Telegram: https://t.me/ElNinoGomez.Send me the address and I will tell you if qualifies and the price. Escrow only.Thank you.
